improved_metadata.title: Lunchbox Dreams: Ghetto Symphonies
improved_metadata.description: A raw and evocative portrayal of growing up in the projects, hustling for survival and chasing dreams amidst poverty and hardship. It reflects the resilience and resourcefulness of young souls navigating a challenging urban landscape.
improved_metadata.key_lyrics: Lunch box dreams, brown back schemes Fightin' for the light through a city that's green
